```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(lavaan)
library(semTools)
library(tidyverse)
library(here)
library(rio)
library(janitor)
library(stringr)
library(knitr)
library(broom)
library(tidyverse)
library(hrbrthemes)
library(viridis)
library(ggridges)
options("scipen" = 999)
```

```{r import_data, include=FALSE}
qualtrics_raw <- import(here("final_project/data/covid_qualtrics_raw.csv"))
mturk_raw <- import(here("final_project/data/covid_mturk_raw.csv"))
raw <- full_join(qualtrics_raw, mturk_raw)
raw_clean <- raw %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  dplyr::select(-c(status, progress, finished, distribution_channel, gdpr_notice, gdpr_consent, consent, start_date, end_date, duration_in_seconds, recorded_date, response_id, age_2, politic, survey_xp, gid, rid, q_total_duration, m_turk_code, sname, risn, opp, toluna_enc, gc, term, ls, vps, ip_block)) %>% 
  slice(3:1180)
```

```{r simulate_randomness, include=FALSE}
library(synthpop)
my.seed <- 18
synth_covid <- syn(raw, seed = my.seed)
```
